400: Oops! It looks this app and our server are not on sync!. Please try to refresh the page and clear cache.
500: We apologize, but it looks something is wrong with our services. Please try again later.
delete_appointment_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this appointment?
delete_workshop_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this workshop?
err_no_next_date: There are no near appointments scheduled for the selected workshop
error-loading-schedule: Error loading schedule. Please try again later.
error-updating-schedule: Error updating schedule. Please try again later.
clear-all-info: This action will clear all unavailable schedule.
clear-all-question: Are you sure you want to continue?
